{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT54G |revision=v7.0 |series=WRT54G |serialnum_prefix=CDFE |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |fcc_date=03/08/2006 |fcc_id=Q87-WT54GV70 |ic_id=3839A-WT54GV70 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2317 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1605AMC-15G |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V641620ETP-H |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2317 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-TNC |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996I |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |stock_os=VxWorks; |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=linksys |default_ssid_regex=^linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_pass=admin |oui=00:18:F8 |oui_eth=00:18:F8 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G Broadband Router}} :[http://www.wrtrouters.com/documents/wrt54g/v7/ Documents (incl. manual) on wrtrouters.com]
"3763-12140102R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
